20110106064218.000|20110106064219.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED HERE, KEVIN?      
20110106064219.000|20110106064220.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YES, CHRISTINE,    
20110106064220.000|20110106064222.000|CC1|THIS IS THE AREA NEAR POST AND  
20110106064222.000|20110106064225.000|CC1|COLTON IN THE CITY OF REDLAND.  
20110106064225.000|20110106064226.000|CC1|AROUND 7:00 REDLAND POLICE      
20110106064226.000|20110106064228.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT GOT A CALL OF SHOTS  
20110106064228.000|20110106064228.000|CC1|FIRED.                          
20110106064228.000|20110106064230.000|CC1|WHEN THEY ARRIVED, THERE WERE   
20110106064230.000|20110106064231.000|CC1|FOUR TEENAGERS HIT.             
20110106064231.000|20110106064232.000|CC1|TWO OF THEM WERE TRANSPORTED TO 
20110106064232.000|20110106064236.000|CC1|THE HOSPITAL IN CRITICAL        
20110106064236.000|20110106064236.000|CC1|CONDITION.                      
20110106064236.000|20110106064238.000|CC1|ONE DIED AT THE HOSPITAL OF     
20110106064238.000|20110106064239.000|CC1|THOSE FOUR PEOPLE.              
20110106064239.000|20110106064241.000|CC1|ONE PERSON WAS PRONOUNCED DEAD  
20110106064241.000|20110106064242.000|CC1|ON SCENE HERE.
